PrivacyRTBFRequest.name: PrivacyRTBFRequest
PrivacyRTBFRequest.description: Represents a Right to Be Forgotten Request made in Privacy Center.

Description.description: The description of the customer’s Right to Be Forgotten request.

JobRecord.description: The record ID that is processed by the Right to Be Forgotten request.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the Right to Be Forgotten request.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the account associated with this customer.

PolicyNameId.description: The name of the Right to Be Forgotten policy applied to this request.

Status.description: Represents the status of the request.
